title: Ghostbusters Marathon
alt: If you walk out that door you'll be crossing the Rubicon with me, and that's one stream I'm not ready to cross.
transcript:
[Two people are in a room. One is standing up. There is litter around them.]
Cueball: Okay, that's all the Ghostbusters marathon I can handle. Later!
Friend: You can't leave! We just started the animated series!Cueball: I've had my fill. I'm going home.
Friend: I can't let you do that.[Cueball walks along a cord and past a box. The friend clicks a switch.]
Click[Cueball is bathed in some kind of aura emitted by the box.]
